input.sentences: some windows had bars on them .
others were just slits in the shape of the cross .
the old wooden door was only one way into the courtyard .
i visited this local church many times .
output.sentences: The ceilings of the church were vaulted in the Gothic style.
The bars on the windows obstructed the view of the outside.
There was a slit cut into the wall in the shape of a cross.
The wooden door in the laid brick wall led to the courtyard.
The local parishioners visited the church multiple times.
